title: Life Upside Down
description: Life Upside Down is a romantic life story with a comedic twist.You just never know who is going to catch your fancy, and either did Erin.* I always thought the love of my life would come in the form of a marble cut man hard as stone. A strong muscular body, a perfect chin chiseled by the gods, and with the wit of a master strategist. I would have never guessed ‘his’ name would be Rose. *
author: Jacey Rhodes
